original_title: Hernán Cortés, un hombre entre Dios y el Diablo
overview: Documentary about a controversial figure, repudiated by many and praised by others, Cortés had led to writing thousands of pages about his life and the military task for which he is known: the conquest of the great Mexica Empire of Moctezuma II. This documentary explores the myth that was created around him and tries to explain a man with a life full of shadows and lights.
title: Hernán Cortés, un hombre entre Dios y el Diablo
